programs.name: Pollinator Pathway (Seattle)
programs.outcome: One-mile corridor along Columbia Street connecting Seattle University to Nora's Woods; expanded model replicated in other cities

programs.name: B-Lines Initiative
programs.outcome: Buglife's network of 'insect pathways' connecting wildlife areas across UK; approximately 3,000 km of B-Lines mapped

programs.name: Pollinator Partnership programs
programs.outcome: Bee City USA and Bee Campus USA certification programs for municipalities committing to pollinator habitat

statistics.claim: Wild bee populations have declined by approximately 25% since the 1990s
statistics.source: Various studies - NEEDS PRIMARY SOURCE VERIFICATION

statistics.claim: Urban lawns cover approximately 40 million acres in the United States
